pages.text: $(#630000)Putrid Units are a crafting ingredient salvaged using a Factory bound to any Feral parasite.

$(#630000)Creating a Feral parasite requires either getting an Assimilated enough kills (very impractical), getting a Gnat to kill a susceptible mob, or directly via $(l:vagrant/factory_upgrading)Factory Upgrading.
$(#630000)It can also be broken down into Assmilated Flesh, if desired.
